file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-09-06 - TRAILING ARM CARDAN OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TRAILING ARM CARDAN OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to inspect the trailing arm cardan of the shock absorber on the Main Landing Gear. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY TRAILING ARM CARDAN OF THE MAIN ALL 32-10-09-200-801-A LANDING GEAR - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-09 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-09-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TRAILING ARM CARDAN OF THE MAIN LANDING GEAR - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to inspect the trailing arm cardan of the shock absorber on the Main Landing Gear. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200 LG SAFETY PIN - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Flash light To make the inspection available Commercially Magnifying glass To make the inspection available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) ASTM D-740 Methyl Ethyl Ketone (MEK To Commercially available Soft lint-free cloth clean the area G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task MLG I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Install the main landing gear safety pin ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). (2) Clean the area to be inspected with a cloth soaked in Methyl Ethyl Ketone. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-10-09 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspection of the Trailing Arm Cardan of the Main Landing Gear (Figure 601) SUBTASK 211-002-A (1) Use a flash light and a magnifying glass to make a detailed visual inspection on the trailing arm cardan of the Main Landing Gear for cracks. Refer toFigure 601. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the landing gear safety pin ( AMM TASK 32-00-01-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 32-10-09 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
